S.FORM: Aziya ru Asyuw hya' ga syuw na hiyal. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 44,579,000 sq km (maki' tay 1ginkgan kin wahci') Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 126,702,133. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' Asia CIA world factbook Asia Encyclopædia Britannica

Aziya ro Asyow hya' ga syow na hiyal. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 44,579,000 sq km (maki' tay 1ginkgan kin wahci') Kinkhmayan kwara' sqoliq hya' ga 126,702,133. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' Asia CIA world factbook Asia Encyclopædia Britannica
